SEARCH
Package com.rikuthin.data

Class AnimationTemplateRepository

java.lang.Object
com.rikuthin.data.AnimationTemplateRepository
public class AnimationTemplateRepository extends Object
Implements the **Repository pattern** as a singleton, providing centralized access and management for all shared AnimationTemplate objects.

This class ensures that animation definitions (templates) are loaded only once, are uniquely identified by a key, and are reused safely across different game entities to conserve memory and maintain consistency.

    • getInstance

      public static AnimationTemplateRepository getInstance()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the AnimationTemplateRepository.
      Returns:
      The AnimationTemplateRepository instance.

    • getAnimation

      public AnimationTemplate getAnimation(String key)
      Retrieves a stored AnimationTemplate by its unique key.
      Parameters:
      key - The unique identifier for the animation.
      Returns:
      The corresponding AnimationTemplate object, or null if a template with the given key has not been added.

    • getAllAnimations

      public Map<String,AnimationTemplate> getAllAnimations()
      Retrieves a read-only view of all stored AnimationTemplate objects.
      Returns:
      An immutable copy of Map containing stored AnimationTemplate objects and their unique identifiers.

    • addAnimation

      public void addAnimation(String key, AnimationTemplate animation)
      Adds a new AnimationTemplate object to the repository, but only if one with given key does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      key - The unique identifier for the animation.
      animation - The AnimationTemplate object to store.
